name: Final decision on the Twitter API
summary:
Not content with banning native third-party apps, Twitter has continued to cripple their API and move to paid plans for very basic access. I was committed to support Twitter cross-posting as long as possible because there are still Micro.blog customers who want to keep a foot in the Twitter world. But we knew it couldnâ€™t last forever.
July 15th will be our last day to support cross-posting blog posts to Twitter.
